resources.string: Choose a game in a category,\n 1 of 2

Picture cards.\n Choose a card with or without a picture. Correct answers will be marked in green, and incorrect ones in red.\n From levels 1 to 7, you can make up to 3 mistakes. At level 8, there are only 2. At 9, there are 1. At 10, you can\'t make a single mistake.
Congratulations!\n\nYou have completed all the levels!
To open this game, you need to complete 3 levels of the previous game.
To open this level, you need to complete the 6th level of each game from the previous level.

" Where's the rabbit.\n Choose the hat that the rabbit is hiding in. Correct answers will be marked in green, and incorrect ones in red.\n From levels 1 to 7, you can make up to 3 mistakes. At level 8, there are only 2. At 9, there are 1. At 10, you can't make a single mistake."

" The goalkeeper. 
 Choose where the player kicks. You only have 5 seconds to make a choice. The countdown will be shown on the field. 
 Correct answers will be marked in green, and incorrect ones in red. 
 From levels 1 to 7, you can make up to 3 mistakes. At level 8, there are only 2. At 9, there are 1. At 10, you can't make a single mistake."
